attributes.review: so my family is full of ✨💫snowflakes💫✨ and in an attempt to expand my knowledge I downloaded this app because surely our lord and savior president Donald trump can’t be as bad as people say but then as soon as I downloaded this app my phone crashed??? I restarted my device and when it finally opened my home screen was trumps face!!! he hacked my phone and invaded my rights 😡😡😡 not to mention I turned off the notifications but still got them! completely ruined my grandpas funeral AND his wake 😪 DO NOT RECOMMEND. If I could give this app zeros stars I would. I expected so much more from our president 🤮 DISGUSTIN
attributes.title: VIRUS 🦠🤯😡🤮

attributes.title: Shawty like a melody

attributes.review:
I was excited for this app, I downloaded it to show my support to my President but once I downloaded it and opened the app it asked for my number which I indeed gave it to them but it took them a long time to contact me back. After a while the app started spamming me notifications and texts back to back asking if I wanted to donate money and telling me other ways I can support my dear president.
I was forced to silence the notifications from the app and even when I did it keep spamming me! 😡
I will be giving this app one star if I could give it any less I would! 😡
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to become more or an 🇺🇸american🇺🇸 but when I downloaded it I discovered something tragic had happened. After the download was completely my dog turned 🍊orange🍊 and wouldn’t stop barking at my mom 😳😳 the app managed to corrupt my dog turning him into a sexist 😫 beast 😫I don’t know how this could have happened but I was so scarred from this experience that I had to go to the 🚑 hospital 🚑 the doctor said I was so close to being turned into an ugly orange and if i hadn’t come in I would have been corrupted just like my 🐶 dog 🐶 all in all this app is no good do not ❌ download ❌
attributes.title: 😔 Rip doggo 😔

attributes.review:
Okay, so I’m not one to judge— 

So onto the story. First entering the app, instead of our fearless leader showing, I saw an 🍊Orange🍊. Just.. An orange. It had hair on it, which lowkey freaked me out, not gonna lie. Second off, the loading icon looked like the nazi symbol (here I thought we weren’t gonna be Germany 2.0) third off, I thought this was a game until it told me it was restricted content, then I thought of the child sex trafficking and noped myself out of there. I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone, not unless you want your information out there, like China has ours.
attributes.title: ⭐️💫✨If there was 0 stars, I’d give it that.🧚‍♀️⭐️✨🌟

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and as soon as I finished downloading my phone turned off for a complete minute after I was able to get in again all my contacts got deleted and I was no longer able to open social media apps because apparently I had deleted them but they were still on my screen . Anyways I downloaded the apps again and reset my phone everything seemed fine until the Wi-fi stopped working . Overall this is a terrible app to me and do not recommend for anyone’s security please do me a favor and avoid this app
attributes.title: Virus?

attributes.review: The fitness gram pacer test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20m pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Lineup at the start. The running speed start slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear the signal. ✨Ding✨A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. ✨Ding✨Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. Your test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start
attributes.title: Up. Down.

attributes.review: This app is awful! It took 10 hours to download and took 30 minutes to load, I timed it. It drained 50% of my battery in 3 minutes, I also timed it. Then it stole all my data and took all my storage! It's so awful!!!! After that 10,300 trump supporters showed up to my door and ate two of my cats. They unhinged their jaw like a snake and swallowed them whole. Then they stole my orange cat and put a blonde wig on him because they thought he was trump. They started chanting about how spray tan is a religion and started sacrificing american flags to my cat!!!! unbelievable!!!! never download this app!
attributes.title: Absolutely awful!!!✨✨✨💖💖💖🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I woke up one morning after a long night of scrolling through facebook minion memes to see this app on my phone. First thing i noticed was our beautiful orange daddy at the beginning, and thought this app was going to be good, boy was i wrong. It kept making my phone lag when all i wanted to do was play candy crush and text my PTA moms, but it just BROKE my phone. My phone worked perfectly fine before this, so i’m sure it was this app. I couldn’t even contact my sons soccer coach to cheat on my husband, Chad, with. how disappointing. I would like to speak to your manager.
attributes.title: WHERE IS YOUR MANAGER

attributes.review: yo this app kinda $ucks like I needed to login with my email or phone number????? pshhhh sounds like some serious caperoonski to me. like cmon i downloaded this app so I could support and keep up with my favorite President but because of how low quality this app is, I think I’ll vote kanye instead not gonna lie. anyways yeah so I tried opening the app before I wrote this, and it just wouldn’t load up! every single time I tried to open the app, it would load for a second, crash, and then bring me back to my home screen. therefore I am leaving a 1 Star review. very unimpressed :(
